comments:
Version: 2.1
Build id: 200301290010

build.xml with the following target:

	<target name="war" depends="compile" description="Create WAR file">
		<war warfile="${war.file}"
				manifest="${metadata.dir}/manifest.txt"
				webxml="${metadata.dir}/web.xml">
			<classes dir="${main.src.dir}">
				<exclude name="**/*.java"/>
				<exclude name="**/hs~*"/>
			</classes>
			<classes dir="${build.dir}" includes="**/*.class"/>
			<lib dir="${lib.dir}"/>
		</war>
	</target>


If the first of the two nested <classes> is included then saving build.xml leads to the following exception:


org.eclipse.ui.externaltools.internal.ant.editor.PlantyException: Substring 'exclude' cannot be found in the specified source string.

Modified first nested <classes> element:

	<classes dir="${main.src.dir}" excludes="**/*.java, **/hs~*"/>


Saving the modified build.xml leads to the following NPE:

I cannot reproduce the bug. :(
Maybe the complete build file is necessary for reproduction.
Please add the build file as attachement, so that tabs in the file
are not replaced by spaces.

Created an attachment (id=3251)
Build file which failed on build 200301290010

With latest integration build 200301291650 this file does not fail any more!!!
Torsten, Alf, should this bug be closed?
Please reopen if the problem can be reproduced.

traces.message: Substring 'exclude' cannot be found in the specified source string.
